籤詩版本二:
Mai hoʻolohe i nā kamaʻilio palaualelo no ka pono a me ka hewa, i ke kakahiaka a me ke ahiahi, hiki iā ʻoe ke haʻi iā ʻAmi wale nō.
Inā he ʻoiaʻiʻo nā ʻōlelo ʻāhiu, ʻo ka puke "How to Stop Hungry" ka huaʻōlelo "general", a ʻo ia ka huaʻōlelo "prize".
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ka hōʻailona o nā keke e hoʻomāʻona i ka pōloli.
ʻOi aku ka hakahaka a me ka liʻiliʻi maoli.
解曰: Ina maopopo ole ka manao, makehewa ke heluhelu i ka palapala hemolele. E like me ka keke i pena ʻia, paʻakikī ka ʻai.
籤詩故事一:
◇ ʻO nā ʻōlelo a Cao Cao e pili ana i nā plums e kinai i ka make wai
I ke au o na Aupuni Ekolu, ua alakai o Cao Cao i kona mau koa, ua nele ka wai i ke kau maloo a ua makewai na koa.
(Maʻaneʻi ka ʻōlelo ʻōlelo "nānā i nā pua plum e kinai i ka makewai." Ua ʻae ʻo ia me ka "pena pōpō e hoʻomāʻona i ka pōloli".)
聖意: E pule no ka laki maikaʻi ma kou home (pono ʻole), pōmaikaʻi i ka waiwai (mai noʻonoʻo i ia mea), ʻoihana maʻemaʻe (kali i kahi minuke), nā pilikia o ka male ʻana (ka hānau ʻole ʻana), nā mea hele wāwae, nā ʻano silika hope, ʻoi aku ka maikaʻi o ke kanu. ʻeono holoholona i kakahiaka nui, maikaʻi ʻole no ka loaʻa ʻana o nā kānaka (paʻakikī), nā hoʻopiʻi lehulehu a (ʻaʻole hauʻoli) ʻO ka neʻe ʻana he conservative, nalowale waiwai, maʻi, a makemake i ka pōmaikaʻi i nā mauna a me nā lua kupapaʻu.
古人: 'Ōleloʻo Cao Cao e pili ana i nā plums e kinai ana i kona makewai
